message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm interested in the product but $11,500 is a bit steep for me right now.  I'm willing to offer $10,500.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that.  Would you consider $11,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment.
Alice, I appreciate you being flexible.  $11,000 is still a bit more than I can comfortably spend right now.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?  I'm really hoping to make this work.
